lead_paragraph: Attention focused on Greece and Ireland has obscured the fact that much larger economies in Germany, the United States and China are growing.
snippet: Attention focused on Greece and Ireland has obscured the fact that much larger economies in Germany, the United States and China are growing.

headline.main: World Economies Are Strong Where It Counts
headline.seo: Germany, U.S. and China Growth to Support Global Economy

byline.original: By IAN CAMPBELL and ANTHONY CURRIE
